languages.text: Предаваясь развлечениям и подозрительному книжничеству, они, безусловно, вносят свой вклад в культурное развитие колонии, но теряют интерес к служению и труду.
As they indulge in recreation and suspicious scholarship, they certainly contribute to the colony's cultural development, but they are also losing interest in service and labour.
languages.original_text: Предаваясь развлечениям и подозрительному книжничеству, они, безусловно, вносят свой вклад в культурное развитие колонии, но теряют интерес к служению и труду.

traits.locale_text: As they indulge in recreation and suspicious scholarship, they certainly contribute to the colony's cultural development, but they are also losing interest in service and labour.
As they indulge in recreation and suspicious scholarship, they certainly contribute to the colony's cultural development, but they are also losing interest in service and labour.

As they indulge in recreation and suspicious scholarship, they certainly contribute to the colony's cultural development, but they are also losing interest in service and labour.

languages.text: Mientras disfrutan de su asueto y de estudios dudosos, contribuyen indudablemente al desarrollo cultural de la colonia pero pierden interés por el servicio y su trabajo.
languages.original_text: As they indulge in recreation and suspicious scholarship, they certainly contribute to the colony's cultural development, but they are also losing interest in service and labour.

traits.locale_text: Mientras disfrutan de su asueto y de estudios dudosos, contribuyen indudablemente al desarrollo cultural de la colonia pero pierden interés por el servicio y su trabajo.

languages.text: Les nobles qui consacrent leur temps aux loisirs et à des sujets d'étude douteux contribuent certes au rayonnement culturel de la colonie, mais c'est au détriment de leur goût pour le travail et la rigueur civique.
languages.original_text: As they indulge in recreation and suspicious scholarship, they certainly contribute to the colony's cultural development, but they are also losing interest in service and labour.

traits.locale_text: Les nobles qui consacrent leur temps aux loisirs et à des sujets d'étude douteux contribuent certes au rayonnement culturel de la colonie, mais c'est au détriment de leur goût pour le travail et la rigueur civique.

languages.text: 贵族沉迷于纵情的声色与可疑的学术，这固然促进了殖民地的文化发展，但也使他们失去了为殖民地忠诚效劳的兴趣。
languages.original_text: As they indulge in recreation and suspicious scholarship, they certainly contribute to the colony's cultural development, but they are also losing interest in service and labour.

traits.locale_text: 贵族沉迷于纵情的声色与可疑的学术，这固然促进了殖民地的文化发展，但也使他们失去了为殖民地忠诚效劳的兴趣。

languages.text: 遊興に興じたり、学問を嗜んだりすることで、コロニーの文化的発展に貢献しているのは確かだが、奉仕活動や労働への関心も失われつつある。
languages.original_text: As they indulge in recreation and suspicious scholarship, they certainly contribute to the colony's cultural development, but they are also losing interest in service and labour.

traits.locale_text: 遊興に興じたり、学問を嗜んだりすることで、コロニーの文化的発展に貢献しているのは確かだが、奉仕活動や労働への関心も失われつつある。

languages.text: Sie frönen Freizeitvergnügungen und fragwürdigen Forschungen, womit sie zweifellos zur kulturellen Entwicklung der Kolonie beitragen, doch sie verlieren auch das Interesse am Dienst und an der Arbeit.
languages.original_text: As they indulge in recreation and suspicious scholarship, they certainly contribute to the colony's cultural development, but they are also losing interest in service and labour.

traits.locale_text: Sie frönen Freizeitvergnügungen und fragwürdigen Forschungen, womit sie zweifellos zur kulturellen Entwicklung der Kolonie beitragen, doch sie verlieren auch das Interesse am Dienst und an der Arbeit.

languages.text: Eğlenceye ve şaibeli ilimlere ilgi duydukları için koloninin kültürel gelişimine katkı sağladıkları aşikâr. Öte yandan hizmet ve işçiliğe olan rağbeti azalttıkları da ortada.
languages.original_text: As they indulge in recreation and suspicious scholarship, they certainly contribute to the colony's cultural development, but they are also losing interest in service and labour.
